subject: Enquiry about delivery to US
description_text:
Hi,

I want to purchase the simsonn plus x pedals, could you please let me know
the details on delivery, tax and customs, where is the product shipping
from and whether I have to deal with customs my self if shipped from
outside USA, and where will be taxed.

Thanks
Manideep

conversations.body_text: Hi Tushar Kanwaria,  We will cover the taxes and fees ourselves, and the goods will be shipped from our US warehouse, so please don't worry.

Hi, thank you for your reply

Can I expect it to be delivered before 31st December with express shipping?






On Mon, 22 Dec, 2025, 6:08â€¯pm service@simsonn.com,
Hi Tushar Kanwaria,    Please place your order as soon as possible, as our US warehouse will soon be closing for the holidays. Orders placed today will ship immediately.  Merry Christmas!
